content.rendered: Agate is one of the oldest healing stones in existence today. In ancient civilizations, it was used in the breastplates of armor to bring warriors strength and make them victorious in battle.  Agate jewelry is thought to be very protective and healing, making agate bracelets the perfect amulet or talisman. This gemstone is also said to bring you courage, emotional strength and self-confidence.
